alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 8:45PM MST until January 01 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Wilbur, Cheney, Post Falls, Coulee City, Spokane Valley, Downtown Spokane, Nespelem, Ritzville, Disautel Pass, Davenport, Hayden, Badger Mountain Road, Ephrata, Tonasket, Waterville, Airway Heights, Coeur d`Alene, Bridgeport, Worley, Creston, Mansfield, Othello, Omak, Rockford, Harrington, Quincy, Brewster, Odessa, Moses Lake, Oroville, Grand Coulee, Fairfield, and Okanogan. * WHEN...Until noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
